ing: 4 cups zucchini, halved and cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1/4-inch pieces
1 green bell pepper, cut into 1/4-inch pieces
1 stalk celery, diced, or more to taste
1/2 teaspoon seasoned salt (such as Johnny's Seasoning SaltÂ®)
des: "I came up with this recipe while prepping ingredients to make a quiche. I realized the veggie mix made a wonderful salad just by itself! Don't skip the Parmesan-Romano cheese, it cuts the acidity of the Worcestershire sauce and garlic and makes for a wonderful flavor blend. My boyfriend heartily approves! This recipe would also be a good vegetable base for a quiche."
ins: Stir zucchini, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, onion, celery, Worcestershire sauce, Parmesan-Romano cheese, garlic, parsley, marjoram, and seasoned salt together in a large bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and let marinate, about 30 minutes.
